title: RISUGAMI'S MODS -光感測器1.3.1
author: ccvb1231
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ccvb1231 于 2012-8-5 16:39 编辑 

光感測器1.3.1
The Light Sensor mod adds a new craftable block, that is a new input for redstone mechanisms. It turns on if it is hit with a 12 light levels. It is crafted with five redstone powder in a + shape, with four iron, one in each corner. Requires ModLoader 1.3.1.
光傳感器mod增加了一個新的的塊craftable，這是一個新的輸入紅石機制。事實證明，如果它打了12光照水平。它是製作五紅石+形狀的粉末，四鐵，在每一個角落。需要ModLoader1.3.1。

replies.author: a410615903
replies.txt_content: 放下后要過一段時間才能用。。
